core

Class DatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.DatabaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DatabaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseListener
    An abstract adapter class for receiving database events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.
    Author:
    Paul Chaignon
